headline.main: WEYGAND IN VICHY, TALKS WITH PETAIN; French Leader in Africa Flies to Confer With Marshal as Axis Chiefs Meet

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, June 2 -- Coming by air from Algeria, General Maxime Weygand, Delegate General of the French Government in Africa with plenary powers, arrived in Vichy this evening and went straight from the air field to the offices of Marshal Henri Philippe Petain, with whom he remained in conversation for nearly two hours.
abstract: Marshal Petain and Gen Weygand conf on French colonial situation
